statements: SELECT * FROM DriverPerformance;
SELECT driver_name, delivery_zone FROM DriverPerformance WHERE delivery_completed = TRUE;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name FROM DriverPerformance ORDER BY completion_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM DriverPerformance WHERE delivery_zone = 'East';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DriverPerformance WHERE delivery_completed = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM DriverPerformance WHERE delivery_completed = TRUE ORDER BY completion_time DESC;
SELECT driver_name, delivery_zone FROM DriverPerformance WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT driver_name, COUNT(driver_id) AS total_deliveries FROM DriverPerformance GROUP BY driver_name HAVING total_deliveries > 5;
SELECT driver_name, delivery_zone FROM DriverPerformance WHERE delivery_zone IN ('North', 'South') ORDER BY driver_name ASC, delivery_zone DESC;
SELECT AVG(completion_time) AS avg_completion_time FROM DriverPerformance WHERE driver_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM driver_performance;
SELECT driver_id, total_miles_driven FROM driver_performance ORDER BY total_miles_driven DESC;
SELECT driver_id, completed_deliveries FROM driver_performance WHERE completed_deliveries > 10;
SELECT * FROM delivery_completion WHERE delivery_status = 'Completed';
SELECT driver_id, delivery_status FROM delivery_completion ORDER BY driver_id ASC, delivery_id DESC;
SELECT driver_id, completed_deliveries, total_miles_driven FROM driver_performance WHERE completed_deliveries > 50 ORDER BY driver_id DESC;

SELECT driver_id, completed_deliveries, total_miles_driven FROM driver_performance JOIN delivery_completion ON driver_performance.driver_id = delivery_completion.driver_id WHERE delivery_status='completed' ORDER BY total_miles_driven DESC;

SELECT driver_id, COUNT(delivery_id) AS total_deliveries FROM driver_performance LEFT JOIN delivery_completion ON driver_performance.driver_id = delivery_completion.driver_id GROUP BY driver_id ORDER BY total_deliveries DESC;
SELECT driver_id, completed_deliveries, total_miles_driven FROM driver_performance WHERE total_miles_driven BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY completed_deliveries ASC, total_miles_driven DESC;
SELECT dp.driver_id, dp.completed_deliveries, dc.delivery_status FROM driver_performance dp JOIN delivery_completion dc ON dp.driver_id = dc.driver_id ORDER BY dp.driver_id, dc.delivery_id DESC;
SELECT driver_id, completed_deliveries FROM DriverPerformance;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_status, delivery_rating FROM DeliveryRates WHERE driver_id = 1234;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_distance, delivery_time, delivery_cost FROM DeliveryMetrics WHERE delivery_cost > 50;
SELECT driver_id, total_deliveries, avg_delivery_time FROM DriverPerformance ORDER BY avg_delivery_time DESC;
SELECT driver_id, completed_deliveries, total_deliveries FROM DriverPerformance WHERE completed_deliveries < total_deliveries;
SELECT * FROM DriverPerformance WHERE driver_id = 1
SELECT driver_id, completed_deliveries FROM DriverPerformance ORDER BY completed_deliveries DESC
SELECT delivery_id, driver_id, delivery_status FROM DeliveryRates WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered'
SELECT driver_id, AVG(avg_delivery_time) as average_time FROM DriverPerformance GROUP BY driver_id HAVING average_time < 30
SELECT dm.driver_id, dm.delivery_distance, dr.delivery_rating FROM DeliveryMetrics dm JOIN DeliveryRates dr ON dm.driver_id = dr.driver_id ORDER BY dm.delivery_distance DESC
SELECT * FROM Drivers;
SELECT driver_name, total_deliveries FROM Drivers ORDER BY total_deliveries DESC;
SELECT driver_name, total_deliveries, completed_deliveries FROM Drivers WHERE total_deliveries > 10;
SELECT driver_name, delivery_id, delivery_date FROM Deliveries WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT driver_name, speed, efficiency FROM PerformanceMetrics INNER JOIN Drivers ON PerformanceMetrics.driver_id = Drivers.driver_id;
SELECT * FROM Drivers WHERE total_deliveries > completed_deliveries;
SELECT driver_name, total_deliveries, completed_deliveries FROM Drivers ORDER BY driver_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(speed), AVG(efficiency) FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT driver_name, delivery_status FROM Drivers JOIN Deliveries ON Drivers.driver_id = Deliveries.driver_id WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT driver_name, completion_rate FROM Drivers JOIN AnalysisResults ON Drivers.driver_id = AnalysisResults.driver_id WHERE completion_rate < 0.8;
SELECT * FROM driver_performance;
SELECT driver_name, delivery_completion_rate FROM driver_performance;
SELECT delivery_id, driver_id, delivery_time, delivery_status FROM delivery_data;
SELECT * FROM driver_stats ORDER BY total_deliveries DESC;
SELECT driver_id, total_miles_driven FROM driver_stats WHERE average_completion_time > '00:30:00';
SELECT * FROM driver_performance;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name FROM driver_performance ORDER BY delivery_completion_rate DESC;
SELECT delivery_id, driver_id, delivery_time FROM delivery_data WHERE delivery_status='completed';
SELECT driver_id, COUNT(delivery_id) AS total_deliveries FROM delivery_data GROUP BY driver_id;
SELECT driver_id, total_miles_driven FROM driver_stats ORDER BY total_miles_driven DESC LIMIT 5;
